( Oh, I'm sorry. Kinda new at all this but thanx for
letting me know. There's a more specific post then.)

Snow Tech growled as he saw almost every one of the
enemy fire upon Dinobot, his battle rage and
excitement only building as he saw his weapon strike
another. He turned and looked at each one of the enemy
in turn but aimed his lightning gun towards Koga Shuko
and fired off an oray of 7 shots towards his chest. It
wasn't fair that they were ganging up on another bot
like that, didn't they have any rules or something
that went against that. Then suddenly Snow Tech got a
dumb look on his face, they were Predacons...they had
no rules!
Shadow Cat glared at all of the Predacons who insisted
on firing upon Dinobot, her own rage rising to the
point of her reaching behind and taking out her
splatter gun. With careful aim she pointed the barel
of it towards Serpentor and fired off about 4 shots
before aiming her weapon towards Sixshot and firing at
him as well.
She didn't like the fact that they were outnumbered
and she didn't like the fact that everyone seemed to
be getting too damaged to fight...it was almost
hopeless.
